docs.snippet: Geno Smith knows that a good showing in Saturday’s game against the Giants is a critical factor in the Jets’ decision to choose him or Mark Sanchez as their starting quarterback....
docs.lead_paragraph: Geno Smith knows that a good showing in Saturday’s game against the Giants is a critical factor in the Jets’ decision to choose him or Mark Sanchez as their starting quarterback.
docs.abstract: New York Jets rookie quarterback Geno Smith recognizes that a good showing in upcoming preseason game against the New York Giants is a critical factor in the team's decision to choose him or quarterback Mark Sanchez as their starter.

headline.main: Smith Feels Pressure as Sanchez Finds Comfort
headline.print_headline: Smith Feels Pressure as Sanchez Finds Comfort

docs.lead_paragraph: The Giants’ center David Baas injured his knee during Sunday’s preseason loss to the Colts, and it could lead to a shake-up on the offensive line.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants center David Baas, who injured his knee in team's 20-12 preseason loss to Indianapolis Colts, is doubtful for upcoming game against New York Jets; other football developments noted.

headline.main: Baas Is in Doubt for Giants’ Opener
headline.print_headline: Baas in Doubt for Opener; Cruz Injury Is Less Serious

docs.snippet: The N.C.A.A. reversed course after declaring Steven Rhodes ineligible to play for Middle Tennessee State because of his participation in an organized football league....
docs.lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. reversed course after declaring Steven Rhodes ineligible to play for Middle Tennessee State because of his participation in an organized football league.
docs.abstract: NCAA restores football eligibility of former Marine Sgt Steven Rhodes amid criticism; originally declared Rhodes ineligible to play for Middle Tennessee State because he participated in organized football during his time with the military.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Restores Marine’s Eligibility to Play Football
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Restores Marine’s Eligibility To Play Football
